content:
XmlTokenizedType Enum

Definition

Represents the XML type for the string. This allows the string to be read as a particular XML type, for example a CDATA section type.

In this Article

public enum XmlTokenizedType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
XmlTokenizedType

Remarks

The XML types are based on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation.

Fields

CDATA

CDATA type.
ENTITIES

ENTITIES type.
ENTITY

ENTITY type.
ENUMERATION

ENUMERATION type.
ID

ID type.
IDREF

IDREF type.
IDREFS

IDREFS type.
NCName

NCName type.
NMTOKEN

NMTOKEN type.
NMTOKENS

NMTOKENS type.
None

No type.
NOTATION

NOTATION type.
QName

QName type.
